name: Puxel Quest
description:
Help Lilli to reach the key.

Place the elements into the right place to create a path.

Version 0.5:

- 9 levels

- 3 different elements for placing

- UI, main menu

- 1,2,3, x ... bugs...

Please give feedback and sugestion for the next Version.

For the next version:

- more elements for placing

- better menu

- more levels

- animation

- lesser bugs

- pattern for a story
